dc:title: Our Spring Appeal - April 1955
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Asks for help, reminding us that we get what we need since "God is not to be outdone in generosity." Notes their Lenten fasting and the results they can expect.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 685 1955-04-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
